document.full_text: people in darfur watching how quickly a no-fly zone was imposed on libya by the united states and its allies said they felt betrayed because u.s. president barack obama had broken his promise to protect them in the same way from government attacks.
document.title: darfuris feel betrayed by libya no-fly zone
lines_and_colors: people in darfur watching how quickly a no-fly zone was imposed on libya by the united states and its allies said they felt betrayed because u.s. president barack obama had broken his promise to protect them in the same way from government attacks.
